description: Let the kids make these easy wraps themselves for a quick and healthy lunch. You can substitute the salmon for tuna.

show.b01ncdlj: I Can Cook on the Go

steps: Spread the cream cheese onto the wrap, sprinkle over the chives, salmon and salad leaves. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
Carefully roll the tortilla up tightly. To serve, either cut the tortilla in half or into 2.5cm/1in slices and turn cut-side up on a plate.
title: Salmon roll-ups
